question: Which is the headquarters of the Missionaries of Charity founded by Mother Theresa?
explanation: Nirmal Hriday was the first home set up by Mother Theresa for serving the poor and destitute of Kolkata. Shanti Nagar was founded later as a colony for lepers and Shishu Bhavan for disabled, orphaned and mentally handicapped children. Shanti Nagar is the headquarters of the Missionaries of Charity founded by Mother Theresa.
